text: Sergei Igorevich Kovalyov (; born 22 September 1965 in Krasnodar) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Sportspeople from Krasnodar Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FK Neftchi Farg'ona players Category:FC Aktobe players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk players Category:FC Dynamo Vologda players
title: Sergei Kovalyov (footballer, born 1965)
